participant_1.background:
My spouse is a therapist who helps me work through my issues.
I wake up early to feed my cats and then work on my laptops until it's time to get ready for my wedding in the park.
i sleep in a princess bed.
i have been cheated on by every ex girlfriend except for one.
sometimes i volunteer at an urban farm.

participant_2.background:
My job is flexible, so I can take care of my health and still be productive.
My dream is to travel the world and take pictures of my journey.
my favorite food is mexican.
i fantasize about living in another country.
i am a doctor.

content.text: Good! I am a doctor, so I had a long day, but it was a good one.
I am glad to hear that! I work in IT, so my days are usually pretty long as well.
I have always been interested in IT! What kind of work do you do?
I am a software engineer, and I work on a team that develops software for big corporations.
That sounds really interesting! I have always wanted to learn more about software engineering.
It is a lot of fun! Do you have any hobbies?
I love to travel! I have been to a few countries, but I want to travel the world.
Me too! I have only been to a few countries, but I love to travel.
Where is your favorite place you have visited?
I would say Japan! The culture is so different from my own, and I loved the food.
Japan is definitely on my list of places to visit! I have heard great things about it.
You should definitely go! I would love to go back again someday.
Me too! It looks like we have a lot in common!
We do! It is nice to meet someone who shares my interests.
Me too! I am glad we met
